title: Lost Planet 3 Repack By R.G Catalyst NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:
INFO:
 Released: 2013
 Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person / 3rd Person
 Developer: Spark Unlimited
 Publisher: 1C-SoftKlab / Capcom
 Game Version: 1.0
 Language: Russian, English
 Sound language: English
 Publication Type: Repack
 Tablet: FLT

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
 Operating system: Windows XP SP3  Windows Vista SP2  Windows 7 SP1  Windows 8
 Processor: Intel Dual Core processor with a clock frequency of 2.5 GHz
 Memory: 3 GB
 Video: with 512 MB VRAM (NVIDIA GeForce 9800 / ATI Radeon HD 4770)
 Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
 Free hard drive space: 16 GB

DESCRIPTION:
    Continued fi action Lost Planet reveals terrifying new details about the notorious planet EDN III and the history of its colonization of the people. Extreme danger and thrills? Three times more than before!
protagonist of Lost Planet 3 - pilot Jim, who left Earth to perform a very difficult and risky, but very lucrative contract with a corporation Neo-Venus Construction (NEVEC), engaged in preparing the planet for colonization. Arriving on EDN III, Jim joined the pioneers on the basis of Coronis and began to study the unexplored areas and extraction of samples of thermal energy - the most valuable resource necessary for survival in the harsh extremes of the planet.
thermal energy stocks belonging NEVEC, coming to an end, so that the fate of Mission colonists based Coronis depends on natural sources that they will be able to discover and learn. Keenly aware that this is a great opportunity to break large sum but still secure a speedy return home to his family, Jim, decided to challenge the inhospitable planet and its native inhabitants - aggressive and bloodthirsty locusts.
